title: Environmental Relationship Type Vocabulary
description: Domain-specific refinement of CEP relationship types for environmental sites, permits, measurements, and regulatory actions.

terms.label: Site Operated by Organization
terms.definition: A relationship where an organization operates, manages, or controls an environmental site or facility subject to regulation or monitoring.

terms.label: Site Covered by Permit
terms.definition: A relationship where a site or facility is covered by a specific environmental permit that governs its operations or impacts.

terms.label: Permit Issued by Regulator
terms.definition: A relationship where a permit is issued, renewed, or amended by a regulatory authority for a site, facility, or activity.

terms.label: Measurement Series for Site
terms.definition: A relationship where a measurement series is associated with a particular site, facility, or monitoring location for environmental reporting or analysis.

terms.label: Measurement Produced by Monitoring Asset
terms.definition: A relationship where a monitoring asset produces or records a measurement series or dataset for environmental conditions or emissions.

terms.label: Enforcement Action Against Entity
terms.definition: A relationship where an enforcement action is taken against an organization or site for environmental non-compliance or violations.

terms.label: Other Environmental Relationship
terms.definition: An environmental relationship type that does not fit another, more specific category in this vocabulary but is needed to represent source systems or regulations.
